name: Updated network to include Airtel and Zamtel
Update Francophone mobile money for Cameroon
Update Francophone mobile money flow
body:
This release has breaking changes for Francophone mobile money. The `RaveUiManager.acceptFrancMobileMoneyPayments` setup function now requires an additional country code parameter.

Usage:
`raveUiManager.acceptFrancMobileMoneyPayments(true,Country)`

name: Bug fixes
body: Fixes crash for Ghana mobile money

name: GH payments Update
body: Added handling for a new provider for GH mobile money payments

name: Bug fixes
body: * Update Uk Payment code display

name: Bug fixes
body: * Update invalid card message

name: Bug fixes
body: * Update MPesa validation instructions

name: Bug fix
body: * Improve transaction status handling

name: Bug fixes
body: * Fix WebViewFragment crash on android 5.1

name: NG Accounts payment improvements
body: * Removed obsolete entries from banks list

name: Uk payments bug fix
body:
* Fixed crash when paying with UK bank accounts
* Arranged payment methods in sample app

name: Looking up saved card bug fix
Prefill phone-number in AccountFragment if available
Fixed colour clash bug and improve theme dark theme implementation
Bug fixes
body: - Added missing resources for verification utils module

name: Bug fixes
body: - Fix  user name not being passed for account payments

name: Optimise saved cards flow, Dark mode adjustment & Improvements
Flow Optimization
body: Mapped country codes internally. Country codes no longer need to be supplied to the SDK for payments, just the currency.

name: Bug fixes
body: - Fixed Ghana Mobile Money Layout

name: Implemented Ghana MoMo CAPTCHA Verification Flow
Bug fixes
body: Fixed verification crash

name: Bug fixes
body:
Fixed saved card charge flow breaking
- Issue with card saving fixed
- Issue with charging saved cards also fixed

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Fixed crash issue for no valid payment type set.
- Other minor bug fixes.

name: Bug fixes
body: - Made optional the mutability state of phone number passed into sdk

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Make layout names more unique, to avoid clashes with main app's
- Show phone number field if phone number is not passed into RavePayManager
- Clean up and improved suggested auth model charge card logic

name: South African bank integration
body:
- Integrated SA bank integration
- Made the presenter constructors more no-UI friendly

# ChangeLog 
- Added the saved card/remember me feature
- Removed `READ_PHONE_STATE` permission to get unique device identifier

# ChangeLog
- Pay with Barter now added!
- Fix to instruction for using Tigo in Pay with Ghana mobile money
- You can now initialise the sdk with `fragment`s instead of only `activity`s
- fix layout import issue

- Removed saved cards feature
- Fix webView 3DS awkward "Not Found" message
- corrected payment instructions for Vodafone for Ghana mobile money payments

- Fixed bug encountered when entering card expiry
- Changed sdk branding from Rave to Flutterwave

- Fresh new improved UI for the SDK!
- Fixed encryption bug for bank account payments

- Added `Pay with USSD` payment method
- Added `Francophone mobile money` payment method
- Added more static and dynamic bank account options for `Pay with Bank Transfer`

- Added Rwanda Mobile Money option
- Added Zambia Mobile Money option
- Added UK bank account payment option
- Added more tests to all payment methods
- Fixed network selection issue in Ghana and Zambia mobile money
- Exposed `initializeNoUi()` function in the `RavePayManager` for users who want access to the `NetworkImpl` and use a custom UI (more on this will be shared in subsequent releases)

- Added pay with Bank Transfer payment method
- Extracted data validation to separate classes and added unit tests
- Added nullViews to all payment methods

- Changed the card expiry date field hint to show that format required
- Correct a typo in the readme
Enabled optional fee display option for payments

# Changelog
- Added a sample of the final transaction response(Json) to the readme
- Added a more elaborate reason for the READ_PHONE_STATE permission to the readme
- Added a staging label that shows when the sdk is in staging mode
- Fix missing flwRef bug for INTERNET_BANKING_FLOW
- Added Luhn’s algorithm for card validation

## Changelog 
- Fixed the 3DSecure flow by using a fixed redirect url
- Added support for Ugandan mobile money

## ChangeLog
- Integrated US ACH payments
- Added support for card pre-authorization

name: 1.0.30b
body:
- Fixing 1.0.30 github release issue
- Introduced the new encryption flow

name: 1.0.30a
body:
- Fixing 1.0.30 github release issue
- Introduced the new encryption flow

name: 1.0.29e
body:
- Removed all secret key requirements
- Changed the requery endpoint

- Add UBA to list of banks in the account payment option
- Fixed a memory leak that occurs immediately after payments complete
- Display the OTP instructions from the banks to the user
- Added proguard rule

- Added support for subaccounts and split payments
- Updated Mastercard and Visa logos
- Moved otp, pin and webview flows to a separate activity for better user experience

name: 1.0.27a
body: Added parameters to enable the implementation of the new remember me/save cards flow
Reverted dependencies from `implementation` to `compile` to fix issues with proguard

name: 1.0.26fix4
body: Revert all dependencies back to compile

name: 1.0.26fix3
body: Changed AESCrypt back to compile from implementation

name: 1.0.26fix
body: Included parcler via compile instead of implementation

# Changelog
- Fixed back navigation issue on Mpesa and Ghana mobile money page
- Changed `compile` keyword to `implementation` for sdk dependencies to prevent them from spilling over into app

name: 1.0.26fix2
body: Changed AESCrypt back to compile from implementation
Added Mpesa and Mobile Money (Ghana) payment methods

- Fixed account payment auth url
- Added exception handler to showProgressIndicator for card and account
Added a fix to exit the webview faster when the internet banking flow is complete
Fix for gtb and first bank internet banking flow

- Changed the base url to the new Azure ones for better handling of timeouts
- Added additional means to get unique phone identifier
Added no_auth payment model.

1. Improved the function for comparing amounts during transaction verification
2. Added payment plans for recurrent card payments

name: 1.0.19-beta
body: Corrected the amount comparison function for transaction validity checks

- Corrected the billing address form for the `AVS` authmodel
- Implemented a flow for the `NOAUTH_INTERNATIONAL` authmodel
Enforced portrait screen orientation mode for the sdk
Implemented a new auth model
Changed the `status` key of the requery response to "Transaction successfully fetched" to avoid confusion

name: Fixed Meta initialisation issue
body: Fixed Meta initialisation issue
Remove all hard references to ravePayInitializer from the account and card presenter to improve separation of concerns
Using the null object pattern to disconnect the view from the presenter when user exits the payment page.
Added a null check to `closeBottomSheetsIfOpen()` in `AccountFragment.java`
Rename field to prevent conflicts with user layouts. Library version bumps
Added date of birth field for Zenith Bank account payments
Convert the tx amount to double before comparing for tx status verification
Added a meta parameter to the Rave initializer

1. Change UI component ids by appending rave to avoid conflicts
2. Create function to check tx validity across account and card transactions
Unified the raw response for bank and account payments

- AVS_VBVSecureCode auth model support included
- Masked the pin field
account payment secret key substitution corrected
Corrected account payment initialization parameters
- Fixed some minor UI glitches
